title: Unplayable for the first time 2k-5kping. Other games is fine.
body:
I've been playing LOL since 2011 I'm not a 24/7 or 6-7hours of playing LOL. But this is the first time that this game for me is unplayable my normal ping is 250ms to 280ms the highest and the is 310+. But now I am at 290-310 ping and sudden 2k-5kms. Can't control my champ but everyone is moving I am just auto attacking. I think it's after the URF patch where is URF is removed or where they bring back URF mode. I can play other online games same ping but I don't hit 2k-5k. Even tho someone is watching or downloading I still can play LOL and other games fine but now the internet  all by myself 2k-5k ping. 

Even tho I have a lot of games I still and always play LOL but now it's totally unplayable for me. Or even if I'm stuck in Silver or Bronze LOL is life xD.

replies.body: Wow that ping is huge!  :(  It sounds like you might be having packet loss, but a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) can help us really know for sure.  Use that on the impacted games for an overview, and let me know what you find.  The steps should provide some troubleshooting specific to your case as well!
